mapper.insert: insert into client ( C_NO, C_NAME, B_NO, B_NO2, C_TYPE, C_OWNER, C_ADDR, C_PHONE, C_FAX, C_EMAIL, C_PIC, C_CREDITLIMIT, C_CREDIT_MONTH, C_CREDIT_DAY ) values ( C_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cName}, ${bNo}, ${bNo2}, #{cType}, #{cOwner}, #{cAddr}, #{cPhone}, #{cFax}, #{cEmail}, ${cPic}, ${cCreditLimit}, ${cCreditDateMonth}, ${cCreditDateDay} )
